Custom field (Release Note): A new setting has been added that allows you to apply transliteration to product URL or not. Setting is available here: Stores > Configuration > Catalog > Catalog > Search Engine Optimization: "Apply transliteration for product URL"

Summary: Product image is lost after deleting an existing Scheduled Update that doesn't affect the image
Custom field (Release Note): Product images are not removed while deleting staging update.

Summary: Apostrophe in store view name is replaced by '
Custom field (Release Note): The grid's store view filters now properly display apostrophes

Summary: Not able to Save Customer attribute information in Admin Edit customer section;
Custom field (Release Note): The store ID of the customer is now implemented properly per website scope for the admin customer edit form.

Summary: [Cloud] Critical Issue with Product Listing with Empty Spaces
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly displays product listings without empty spaces when products are set to 'Out of Stock', ensuring a consistent and accurate display of available products. Previously, setting a product to 'Out of Stock' would result in an empty space appearing in the product listing, disrupting the layout and potentially confusing customers.

Summary: Default shipping address is not selected on checkout
Custom field (Release Note): Default shipping address is now being selected event in context of enabled address search.

Summary: [Cloud] Wrong bundle product price when used with tier prices
Custom field (Release Note): Previously when calculating certain percentage discounts rounded up to 2 decimal points will generate different final prices for the cart and product listing page/product details page. After this fix is applied, the final price for the bundle product is the same as in the product details page, product listing page, and mini cart page.

Summary: Catalog Promotions Rule not working with quantity_and_stock_status attribute
Custom field (Release Note): The quantity_and_stock_status attribute will now be taken into account by the catalog promotion rule, which was not previously taken into account when generating new product from the admin side.

Summary: GraphQL product list sorting by multiple parameters doesn't work
Custom field (Release Note): Product sorting by multiple fields in GraphQl now works as described in the documentation

Summary: [Cloud] Reindexing Catalog Rule Product Indexer throws SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 2006 MySQL server has gone away.
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly handles custom "batchCount" value in the di.xml for the "Magento\CatalogRule\Model\Indexer\IndexBuilder", preventing SQL errors such as "General error: 2006 MySQL server has gone away" during the reindexing of the Catalog Rule Product Indexer due to the incorrect batch size on large catalogs

Summary: ACP2E-2836: [Cloud] Investigate exception found in the log: InvalidArgumentException: Class does not exist in vendor/magento/module-rule/Model/ConditionFactory.php
Custom field (Release Note): Removing a condition on PageBuilder products content settings no longer causes an exception to be recorded in the log files. Previously, removing a condition on PageBuilder products content settings would cause a critical exception to be recorded in the logs, despite not causing any issues on the frontend.

Summary: Product entity updated_at column values not updating while updating price through REST API
Custom field (Release Note): The product 'last updated at' column from the admin is updated the proper date time while updating the existing products through the REST API. Previously the column 'last updated at' is not updated properly.

Summary: It's possible to set non-unique values via product import
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly enforces the unique value constraint for unique product attributes during product import, preventing from having duplicate values for that such attribute. Previously, it was possible to set non-unique values for product attributes that were configured to have unique values via product import.

Summary: Payflow creates new transaction each time we click on fetch button on the view transaction screen
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly fetches transaction information without creating a new payment transaction each time the fetch button is clicked on the view transaction screen. Previously, clicking the fetch button would incorrectly create a new payment transaction for an order that had already been paid.

Summary: Switching to single store mode - global content no longer appears
Custom field (Release Note): The system now synchronizes store view design configurations with website design configurations when enabling single store mode, ensuring that content updates are visible on the frontend. Previously, switching to single store mode would prevent content updates from being reflected on the storefront.

Summary: Products on the frontend use store specific data when Single-Store Mode is enabled
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when we enabled single store mode for the default store view, the changes were not migrated to the website-level scope. After this fix is applied, when we enable single store mode, the default store view-specific data will be synced with website-level-specific data and will resolve the possible conflicts for products and categories.

Summary: Issues after upgrading MariaDB to 10.5.1 or higher
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed the issue when datetime values in a DB would be converted to  0000-00-00 00:00:00 after Mysql upgrade

Summary: Favicon upload fails to validate .ico files
Custom field (Release Note): The file validation error has been updated to "File validation failed. Please verify the Image Processing Settings in the Store Configuration." Previously, it was simply "File validation failed."

Summary: Order gets rejected on multi-store setup when using Async-order processing + Terms and Conditions
Custom field (Release Note):
The orders placed from non default websites with terms and conditions enabled are now processed.
Before they were automatically rejected.

Summary: Type Mismatch in Data Comparison when checking if data has changes
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the save object was called every time without any data changes (for any numeric data field - like int/float/double). It triggers the flag _hasDataChanges to be true and calls the save function. After this fix applies, the save function will call only if the data is changed. The data value for int/float/double-check with the value passing to the function and does strict type matching.

Summary: Cannot set "Default Sort By" in a category using the rest API
Custom field (Release Note): Update correctly default_sort_by on a category through REST / SOAP APi request

Summary: Products/Categories visible during reindexation when using NoDDL and Category Permissions
Custom field (Release Note): Avoid displaying on storefront restricted categories and their content while catalog permissions indexing is being performed.

Summary: CMS Page hierarchy can cause URL rewrite issues
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, for custom permanent URL rewrite for non-website root pages, redirect infinitely and the page was never loaded. After this fix is applied, the custom URL rewrite for the non-website root page works as expected and no redirection loop occurs.

Summary: [Cloud] The Merchant is facing issues with wishlist count
Custom field (Release Note): Adding a product to the wishlist in one store no longer increases the wishlist count in other stores open in the same browser. Previously, if both stores were loaded in the same browser, the wishlist count would increase in the other store as well.

Summary: [Cloud] Price display in mobile and desktop version not the same in "My quotes"
Custom field (Release Note): Unneeded Include Tax line is not shown anymore in Negotiable Quote when catalog total price section is expended.

Summary: Category Page at frontend shows empty slots when using bundle product
Custom field (Release Note): Bundle products that are not salable in current store context are not indexed anymore.

Summary: [CLARIFICATION] Bundle product sequence table issues
Custom field (Release Note):
The records in the Bundle product sequence tables (sequence_product_bundle_option, sequence_product_bundle_selection) are now removed when Bundle product is deleted or Bundle product options are deleted.
Previously the records in the Bundle product sequence tables were not removed.

Summary: [CLOUD] graphql addProductsToCart api issue with custom option
Custom field (Release Note): GraphQL adds to cart correctly the same product with different custom options

Summary: Scheduled update settings not saved if originally added by running update
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly clears product attributes values in subsequent scheduled updates when such attributes is modified in the currently running update. Previously, when a product attribute was modified by a running scheduled update, it was impossible to clear such attributes values when creating a new scheduled update, requiring the user to re-edit them after creation.

Summary: Add/Update Import on Products Duplicating Customizable Options
Custom field (Release Note):
The issue has been resolved by assigning the correct store to product options during product options CSV imports.
Previously, assigned to the admin store instead of their respective store.

Summary: Page Builder replaces image when trying to add link and other usability glitches.
Custom field (Release Note): Now clicking on an image, links in wysiwyg editor in Page Builder text element will load proper data in the image, link configuration dialog. Also adding a link to an image in the editor now works properly. Previously, the image was replaced with a link.

Summary: [Cloud] Issue of Quote in multi-website architecture
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, multi-website architecture with different currencies and customer groups could not correctly apply discounts to the store. After this fix is implemented, multi-website architecture with different customer group price discounts will apply successfully to different stores.

Summary: dynamic-rows.js:658 Uncaught TypeError: dataRecord.slice while editing bundle products
Custom field (Release Note): There is no javascript error in browser console while deleting option from bundle product.

Summary: Order Rest API call is taking a long time to execute
Custom field (Release Note): The system now executes the Order Rest API call within a reasonable timeframe, improving the performance when fetching a large number of orders. Previously, the Order Rest API call was taking a long time to execute, causing delays when retrieving a large number of orders.

Summary: [Cloud] Related Products Rules not working when changing the store view
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been fixed by confirming that the custom property value is successfully received on the cart page. Previously, it wasn't fetched properly when switching between stores on the storefront cart page.

Summary: Multiple addresses added to the account when checkout as new customer
Custom field (Release Note): The system now saves a new customer address only once if the order failed to be created, preventing the creation of multiple identical addresses in the event of order placement errors. Previously, the system would save a new address each time an order placement attempt was made, regardless of whether the order was successfully created or not.

Summary: [CLOUD]Cart Price Rule for Visitors Customer Segment not applying discount on cart
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly applies Cart Price Rules for Visitor Customer Segments, even if the rule does not use a coupon, ensuring that the appropriate discounts are applied to the cart. Previously, discounts were not being applied to the cart for Visitor Customer Segments unless the Cart Price Rule used a coupon.

Summary: [REST API]: Use Default value in store view does not stay checked after adding configurations for a configurable product
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been fixed by ensuring correct database entries for the customizable options for a non-default store. The checkbox for the custom store in the "admin > Catalogue > Product Edit > Customizable Options" section was previously unchecked owing to inaccurate database entries, even if the option title for the custom store stayed the same as the default store.

Summary: GraphQL Products call containing the price filter {from:"0"} returns no result
Custom field (Release Note): Previously graphql products search with filter for zero prices did not return any results at all due to a thrown exception. Now the search returns results as expected.

Summary: [Cloud] addFilterToMap function is not working for certain columns
Custom field (Release Note): Now, the custom module can be used in the order grid. Previously errors occurred while using a custom module.

Summary: [Cloud]Follow-up: Mismatch in Data Comparison when checking if data has changes
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the save object was called every time without any data changes (for any numeric data field - like int/float/double). It triggers the flag _hasDataChanges to be true and calls the save function. It also does not check the floating numbers encapsulated by string. After this fix applies, the save function will call only if the data is changed. The data value for int/float/double-check with the value passing to the function and does strict type matching

Summary: [Cloud] Bundle Product wrong pricing in order confirmation
Custom field (Release Note): Correct amount is displayed for bundle options in order on Storefront when currency other than base one was used.

Summary: YouTube Video Adding Bug
Custom field (Release Note): Product images and videos are configured in global scope. Given that you can't have a product video in one scope and not in another, Youtube API key setting has been set to global scope.

Summary: Gallery in PageBuilder is showing old image thumbnail instead of newly uploaded image
Custom field (Release Note): Regenerate image previews for images deleted and re-uploaded with same name through media gallery in page builder content.

Summary: [Cloud] import cannot be used with directory var
Custom field (Release Note): Product can be imported successfully regardless of the file name.

Summary: [Cloud] URL update only for store_id=0
Custom field (Release Note): The "URL Path" is now stored with the correct store ID. Previously, the store ID was incorrect, resulting in incorrect URL paths remaining in the database when moving categories.

Summary: In ipad mini the menu and header loads as mobile, instead they should load as desktop.
Custom field (Release Note): The system now treats devices with a width of 768px as desktop, ensuring that the menu and header load correctly. Previously, devices with a width of 768px were treated as mobile, causing the menu and header to load in a mobile view.

Summary: REST API unable to make requests with slash (/) in SKU when using Oauth1
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, you were not able to make a successful API call for a product that had "/" in its SKU. Now, you can issue a successful API get request for product details even though its SKU has a forward slash in it.

Summary: Old media gallery fails to render images when a 0-byte image is placed in the directory
Custom field (Release Note): The system now handles 0-byte images in the media gallery without disrupting functionality, allowing other images in the directory to be displayed and selected as expected. Previously, the presence of a 0-byte image in the media gallery would prevent all images in the directory from being displayed or selected.

Summary: Translations for customer return attributes not reflected in GraphQL API for respective StoreView
Custom field (Release Note):
Translations for customer return attributes are reflected in GraphQL API for respective StoreView.
Previously customer Return attributes for respective StoreView were not reflected in GraphQL API.

Summary: Saving product by admin user with different role scope overwrites/deletes existing Related product information in the product
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, before the fix, the related products were reset and became empty when the secondary admin user clicked on the save button without changing in related product. After this fix, the secondary admin user clicks on the save button and the product doesn't reset and is saved successfully.

Summary: Catalog price rule is not showing when it is set to schedule with dynamic blocks
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly displays dynamic content associated with scheduled catalog price rules on the product detail page. Previously, dynamic content failed to load when catalog price rules were scheduled.

Summary: Order refund results in duplicate credit memo
Custom field (Release Note): Issuing the refund over REST API when two identical requests were executed simultaneously will no longer create duplicate Credit Memos.

Summary: Customer "created_at" date Not Converted to store time zone upon export
Custom field (Release Note): A column 'created_at' date value is converted to the proper date format based on the store timezone in the customer export CSV section.

Summary: Cart Price Rule from date and to date issue not Synced with Staging Update
Custom field (Release Note): Dates are saved according to updates for Cart Price Rule Staging.

Summary: [CLOUD] Cannot Disable Send Emails from Admin UI as Dev Docs shows
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly prevents sales emails from being sent when email communication is disabled. These emails will no longer be sent when email communication is re-enabled. Previously, sales emails initiated while email communication was disabled would still be sent once email communication was re-enabled.

Summary: [CLOUD] Incorrect base_row_total in RESTFUL order API when enabling cross-border transactions and applying coupon discounts
Custom field (Release Note): Now correct base_row_total is returned from RESTFUL order API when cross-border transaction is enabled and coupon discount is applied.

Summary: Reordering customer order via guest order form results an empty cart
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when placing a reorder through the Orders and Returns page, the customer was redirected to the login page. After this fix is applied, the registered customer is correctly redirected to the View Cart page when placing a reorder. The flow works the same as like as guest customers.

Summary: async.operations.all executed and created an error.
Custom field (Release Note): Incorrect product link data in REST API calls no longer cause critical errors.

Summary: [Cloud] PHPSESSID is changing each POST Request
Custom field (Release Note): PHPSESSID no longer regenerates on POST requests on frontend area for a logged-in customer if L2 Redis cache is enabled and the customer was updated from the backend

Summary: Missing "Type" Attribute in "Products to Match" Tab of Related Product Rules
Custom field (Release Note): The "Type" attribute is now available as a filter option in the "Products to Match" tab of the "Related Product Rules" module, allowing for more precise rule definition. Previously, this attribute was missing from the "Products to Match" tab, limiting the ability to create accurate matching criteria.

Summary: Admin User with limited Role Resources unable to view Shopping Carts
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the restricted admin could not see the abandoned shopping cart from the admin panel for an associated website. After this fix is applied, the restricted admin can see the abandoned shopping cart from the admin panel.

Summary: Paylater message not showing in PDP for Canadian paypal merchant account
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly displays the PayLater message for Canadian PayPal merchant accounts on the Product Detail Page (PDP) when the buyer's country can be determined from the account billing address or shipment. Previously, the PayLater message was not displayed due to a missing parameter, resulting in an error in the browser console.

Summary: [Cloud] Mobile Issue Only not able to pinch on the PDP image
Custom field (Release Note): The system now supports pinch-to-zoom functionality on product detail page images in mobile view on Chrome, enhancing the mobile user experience. Previously, double-tapping on the image in mobile view on Chrome did not zoom in on the image as expected.

Summary: Unable to export more than 200 orders
Custom field (Release Note): The server limits for the request size of previously submitted selected IDs have been neglected by altering the HTTP request from GET to POST in order to fix the issue. Previously, due to the server limitations for GET request size, the issue was encountered.

Summary: Checkout page Validation message incorrect.
Custom field (Release Note): If any required field is left empty, such as "address," the server-side validation will not display the message. The client-side validation will ensure that the required field error notification appears, stating "This is a required field." Previously, the message "address is required" would appear if any required field was left empty, in addition to the client-side validation message.

Summary: Restricted admin users can't always see custom shared catalogs
Custom field (Release Note): Restricted admin users can now consistently view and manage customers and all shared catalogs to which the products are assigned, provided they have access to the specific store. Previously, a restricted admin user with access to a particular store could not always see all shared catalogs to which the products were assigned or could see customers that could not save, leading to inconsistencies in the system.

Summary: Unnecessary borders on the My Orders section
Custom field (Release Note): Previously an additional container(order references) was created that applied additional CSS classes, which caused unnecessary border lines were appearing below the order number inside the My Orders section, which isn't visible now.

Summary: Order closed without fully refunded
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly maintains the order status as 'Processing' and the invoice status as 'Pending' when an order with an uncaptured payment has a shipment created. This ensures that orders are only marked as 'Closed' after being fully refunded. Previously, creating a shipment for an order with a pending invoice would incorrectly change the order status to 'Closed'.

Summary: Base table or view not found error when running mview cron while having a DDL operation
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly handles database update operations while mview update is running in background, preventing the occurrence of 'Base table or view not found' errors. Previously, some database update operations could result in 'Base table or view not found' error, if mview update was running at the same time.

Summary: [Cloud] Elastic search error on certain category pages
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, with the configuration ticket mentioned, when we put price 0 for multiple products, it will throw an exception at the frontend category page. After this fix applied when multiple product price 0 and we load category page at frontend it wont throw any exception and will load category page successfully.

Summary: Missing label in LayeredNavigation with option name 0
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been resolved by skipping an empty value checker for attribute value 0. Previously, it was considered empty and was causing the issue.

Summary: [Cloud] Confusion library code in effect-drop.js of AC 2.4.4-p8
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly implements the effect-drop.js library, ensuring the proper functioning of jQuery UI effects. Previously, the effect-drop.js library was mistakenly overwritten with the effect-clip.js library, causing potential issues with jQuery UI effects.

Summary: [Cloud] Cache is not getting invalidated.
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when saving a CMS page with an updated design layout, it did not reflect appropriately on the front end. After this fix is applied, the appropriate design layout will be visible at the front end when we change the design layout and save the CMS page.

Summary: Error Page Builder when editing CMS Block
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly saves changes made in the admin area using Page Builder, without throwing the error "Page Builder was rendering for 5 seconds without releasing locks." in the browser console. Previously, this error would occur when attempting to save changes, preventing the successful update of content.

Summary: Magento discards most New Relic cron transactions #34108
Custom field (Release Note): AC is correctly reporting cron job related transactions to NewRelic. Previously, some cron job related transactions would be shown as "OtherTransaction/Action/unknown" in NR

Summary: Customers see prices from other customer groups
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed issue where customer group related information was saved in a wrong segment due to the old value of the X-Magento-Vary in request

Summary: Error when deleting bundle options
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly deletes bundle options without triggering an error or causing the page to become unresponsive. Previously, attempting to delete bundle options would result in a "Page Unresponsive" error and prevent the product from being saved.

Summary: Customer address update failing when updating through REST API if "validateDefaultAddress" enabled
Custom field (Release Note): The API endpoint is now functioning as intended after the problem with the ID key missing from the API payload has been resolved.

Summary: Admin Ordered Products Report date range visibility issue.
Custom field (Release Note): The user will be able to select any date from the ordered products report. Previously, after a table refresh, selecting 'FROM' date will reset 'TO' date.

Summary: Handling Category Filters in GraphQL: includeDirectChildrenOnly and category_uid
Custom field (Release Note): Only the direct child categories are fetched while filtering by category_uid.

Summary: [Cloud] Creating the Duplicate website group price customer group in Tier Prices Api.
Custom field (Release Note):
Now Tier Price Rest Api doesn't allow to create the Duplicate website group price customer group.
Previously it was possible to create the Duplicate website group price customer group in Tier Prices Api that would not pass validation in Admin during product save.

Summary: [CLOUD] No buttons of checkout or edit cart on the cart section
Custom field (Release Note): Bundle product is now added to the cart via widgets without errors.

Summary: Category Permissions out of memory browser issue
Custom field (Release Note): Category Permissions UI was redesigned to allow rendering a large amount of permissions using out of box UI component and pagination. Previously category permissions would cause browser to crash with large amount of permissions assigned to the category.

Summary: Incorrect curl headers making `newrelic:create:deploy-marker` not working
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly formats curl headers, allowing the `newrelic:create:deploy-marker` command to successfully create a deployment marker in New Relic. Previously, incorrect curl headers prevented the creation of a deployment marker in New Relic.

Summary: Datepicker for product with multiple Customizable Options with date fields not working when placing order from admin
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly displays the date picker for all date fields when configuring a product with multiple customizable date options in the admin order creation process. Previously, the date picker was only displayed for the first date field, leaving the remaining fields without a date picker.

Summary: [Cloud] Image File does not exist in New Relic Error Log
Custom field (Release Note): The system now synchronizes custom placeholder images to local storage, ensuring that they render correctly when using remote storage such as AWS S3. Previously, custom placeholder images failed to render when using remote storage, resulting in a broken image display and error logs.

Summary: New Products RSS feed is not updated with new products due to cache
Custom field (Release Note): The Rss feed for New Products is now updated when a product is set as new and saved

Summary: JS error in Staging Preview
Custom field (Release Note): Now the form-mini-stub.js file is loading successfully without any Js syntax error in Developer tools.

Summary: Content Staging preview on category pages does not show product widgets
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been fixed by ensuring that product entries for the additional category linked to the CMS block have been accurately recorded into the database. Previously, it was returning an empty result set when the category preview page was requested.

Summary: [Cloud] Can't create customer via API when Private Sales is enabled
Custom field (Release Note): Now customer can be created by authenticated admin user as well as with authenticated integration token via REST api when website restriction is enabled.

Summary: [CLOUD] Upload image button doesn't work
Custom field (Release Note): Before the Upload Image button for Banner and Slider from PageBuilder didn't work as expected, and now when pressing it opens the local file manager to select the wanted image to upload.

Summary: Password reset template issue with Admin user
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been resolved by using the correct key, which now includes the admin username in the email template and properly completes the subject. Previously, the problem stemmed from an outdated key that was being used.

Summary: [Cloud] Product Media Gallery GQL response is not sorted by image position
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly sorts items in the media gallery by position in the GraphQL response, ensuring accurate display order. Previously, items in the media gallery were not sorted by position, leading to an incorrect display order.

Summary: imagecreatetruecolor(): Argument #2 ($height) must be greater than 0. Can't upload specific image
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved the issue causing errors in the admin when uploading images with a height of 0 via the media gallery, and successful the assets synchronization using the sync command. Previously can't upload the image via the media gallery and the sync command also fails when a specific image is in the gallery.

Summary: [Cloud] Broken GraphQL call for getPurchaseOrder with node quote
Custom field (Release Note): The Purchase Order GraphQL call will be able to execute the task without encountering any internal server errors.

Summary: Can't add order comment with status via REST API
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been resolved by allowing the change in order status if it is from the current state only. Previously, it was not honouring the order state and preventing changes in any order status, even if it was from the same state.

Summary: [Cloud] Anchor/Non-Anchor Categories Reversed in Content Widget
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when we selected Display On -> Anchor Categories, it showed all the categories that did not reflect the parent-child relation between the anchor and non-anchor. After this fix is applied, the  Display On -> Anchor Categories only displays Anchor Categories (selectable), and  Display On -> Non Anchor Categories displays Non-Anchor Categories (selectable)

Summary: [Cloud] Sub Category items are not displayed on the widgets edit on the admin backend
Custom field (Release Note): The category tree on the new widget page should no longer have issues loading Level 5+ categories. Previously, some categories were missing when loading the tree past Level 5 categories.

Summary: Sales Rule with Discount Qty Step (Buy X) attribute causes other rules to not be applied
Custom field (Release Note): Cart price rule does not cancel previously applied rules if quantity of the product in the cart is not enough for rule to be applied.

Summary: PayPal order refund results in duplicate credit memo
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed concurrency issue of IPN-created credit memos for PayPal payment service.

Summary: GTM missing addToCart event in dataLayer for configurable product with custom option
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the addToCart event was not being triggered for configurable products. Now, the event is properly added to the GTM dataLayer variable.

Summary: Double slashes in customer segment URL
Custom field (Release Note): Double slashes do not appear in the URL when 'Reset Filter' is clicked in the grid.

Summary: Categories not working with widgets
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, if we saved the CMS block for different anchor/non-anchor categories, it did not work for the child categories when it showed on the front end. After this fix has been applied, the block is shown at the front end for different categories.

Summary: Prototype.js Array.from in conflict with Google Maps API
Custom field (Release Note): Google Maps now renders properly in PageBuilder editor. Previously, a Javascript error prevents Google Maps from rendering correctly.

Summary: Product Special Price Staged Content cannot be updated
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows for the editing of the end date of a price update campaign after it has started, ensuring that users can make necessary adjustments to their campaigns. Previously, an error was thrown when attempting to update the end date of an active campaign, preventing users from making changes.

Summary: Cart price rule not working for Paypal
Custom field (Release Note): Correct amount is shown on PayPal side when discount is applied by payment method

Summary: [Cloud] Getting error while checking the data in import data using CSV
Custom field (Release Note): There is no error when checking the data during CSV import. Previously, the error message displayed was: "We can't find a customer who matches this email and website code in row(s): 1" when checking the data in the import section using CSV from the admin.

Summary: [Cloud] Graphql Product sorting do not work
Custom field (Release Note): GraphQl Product sorting by multiple fields when the fields are passed in variables now works as expected.

Summary: After update to 2.4.5-p8 500 errors occur when creating order from admin
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when enabling HTML minification, an order from admin could not be placed. Now, with HTML minification enabled, the order from admin can be placed successfully.

Summary: COD is not available for allowed specific countries
Custom field (Release Note): Now Cash on delivery is available for allowed specific countries whenever it is required and   AC-3216 is working as expected.

Summary: Import button missing
Custom field (Release Note): Resolve the Import button missing issue after data checks with correct and incorrect records in the CSV. Previously the import button doesn't display after data checks with correct and incorrect records in the CSV.

Summary: [Cloud] quick order large amount of SKU performance
Custom field (Release Note): Checkout performance has been improved when attributes used in cart price rules conditions are not present for all products and when MAP (Minimum advertised price) feature is enabled.

Summary: Cannot update Custom created Order status
Custom field (Release Note):
'
We can now update custom-created order statuses, whereas previously, the status could only be changed if the current status was either "processing" or "fraud."

Summary: NewRelic browser monitoring inlineJS  script causes CSP errors
Custom field (Release Note): NewRelic Browser Monitoring scripts are now injected by the application instead of the APM agent for compliance with CSP (Content Security Policy). Previously, NewRelic Browser Monitoring scripts injected by APM agent were not compliant with CSP and caused the scripts to not be executed.

Summary: [Cloud] Configurable Products not shown in Production Site if Product is not enabled in "All Store Views"
Custom field (Release Note):
The system now correctly displays configurable products in the site even if the product is not enabled in "All Store Views", but is enabled in specific store view scopes. 
Previously, if a product was disabled in "All Store Views" and enabled only in specific store view scopes, the product attributes would not be displayed correctly in the GraphQL response, leading to the product not being displayed properly.

Summary: Metric in NR might be misleading for background transactions- Follow up of ACP2E-3067
Custom field (Release Note): Background transactions (cron) will use New Relic app name defined in the config settings

Summary: INSERT queries to the sales_bestsellers_aggregated_daily table become slow on project with large sales order volume
Custom field (Release Note): Previously the bestsellers aggregated daily report would take a lot of time to generate for large volume of placed orders. Now the report is generated in a timely manner.

Summary: [Cloud] Products graphql having error when same simple product has assigned to multiple configurable products
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, with separate configurable products with the same simple product, grapQL returns an error. After this fix apply, different configurable products with the same simple product, grapQL returns result without no error.

Summary: Fixed Product Tax (FPT) is not working with configurable products
Custom field (Release Note): FPT for configurable product variations working properly.

Summary: Shipping address empty while placing an order for a gift registry item
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, for guest user gift-registry items, when returned from the email function, generated an empty blank address, which is incorrect for placing an order. After this fix is applied, the gift registry checks logged-in user/guest users and assigned addresses if they exist.

Summary: [cloud] Two-finger zoom and move issue on the real mobile device
Custom field (Release Note): The system now ensures consistent image zoom functionality on mobile devices, providing a smooth and predictable user experience. Previously, the image zoom feature was inconsistent and would suddenly zoom out after a certain point when viewed on a mobile device.

Summary: [Cloud] Users with a specific role cannot login
Custom field (Release Note): admin user with role that contain only PayPal Section access now can login without errors

Summary: Duplicated items in cart
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly processes multiple parallel requests to add the same product to the cart into a single line item, preventing the creation of separate line items for the same SKU. Previously, making parallel requests to add the same product to the cart on Storefront would result in multiple line items for the same SKU.

Summary: [Cloud] Issue with User Authentication and Cross-Site Token Access in Multi-Site Setup
Custom field (Release Note):
GraphQl Customer Info and Cart queries in Multi-Site setup checks if the customer on non-default website exists.
Previously query worked without making sure the customer exists on non-default website in Multi-Site setup.

Summary: Modifying column length via db_schema.xml doesn't work in case of foreign keys
Custom field (Release Note): modifying column with foreign key via declarative schema now doesn't rise errors with MariaDB

Summary: Admin can still place order even without payment method
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the merchant could place orders from the admin panel without selecting a payment method. Now, the merchant is required a payment method to proceed with placing an order.

Summary: Async operation fails when the SKU is missing from the payload
Custom field (Release Note): Async and sync operations previously failed due to product save errors if sku is missing from payload. After the fix, the async and sync product save rest api operations fail with relevant exception message.

Summary: Customer API - Login Failures Number Not Able To Reset To 0 After Successful Login
Custom field (Release Note): Now failure number is reset to zero in customer entity table after customer successful login through API endpoints.

Summary: sales_clean_quotes cron deletes quotes from to yet approved purchase orders
Custom field (Release Note): Quotes used in purchase orders now will not be deleted by sales_clean_quotes cron job

Summary: GraphQL cart itemsV2 pagination is not working correctly
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been fixed by passing the correct value for the current page argument in the collection query. Previously, the wrong value was getting passed to set the current page, causing the issue.

Summary: [GRAPHQL] model value should be specified when getting customerCart
Custom field (Release Note): The GraphQL 'customerCart' query can now create an empty cart even when the quote is not available in the database. Previously, this operation failed due to country validation issues while creating the empty cart.

Summary: ReCaptcha V2 shows incorrectly on checkout for German language
Custom field (Release Note): Previously the recaptcha from under email address from checkout appear unstyled for languages with long words, like german. After this the recaptcha looks the same as all recaptcha elements from the rest of the areas.

Summary: [Cloud] - CMS Slider not reflecting the latest changes
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been fixed by ensuring the slider list gets refreshed while the save event is triggered on the edit slide screen. Previously, it was triggering and causing the issue.

Summary: Order reports showing the wrong currency symbol
Custom field (Release Note): The currency symbol for order amounts in the Order Report was incorrectly taken from currency/options/base. It has now been corrected to use currency/options/default for accurate reporting.

Summary: When we unassign products from the shared catalog, the wishlist products are not being cleared
Custom field (Release Note): Now, no items are visible in the wishlist if a product is not available in the shared catalog. Previously, the wishlist page incorrectly displayed a count of "1 Item" even when no items were actually available in the wishlist.

Summary: Related products Select All/Unselect All Issue
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the "Select All"/"Unselect All" buttons for related products didn't work correctly if a product was manually selected. After the fix, these buttons now function consistently, even after manual selection, ensuring that all products are properly selected or unselected.

Summary: The shipping address state is not auto updating
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, the shipping address region (or region id) was not in sync with the address billing information. Now, both shipping address region and region id are properly updated when billing address information is changed.

Summary: Checkout order email confirmation is sent to emails entered in First/Last name
Custom field (Release Note): The checkout order email confirmation, which was previously sent when an email-like pattern was entered in the First and Last Name fields, is no longer being sent.

Summary: Captcha on admin login does not require interaction for some users
Custom field (Release Note): ReCaptcha for admin login is validated as expected

Summary: [Cloud] Incorrect Calculations in Coupon Usage Report
Custom field (Release Note): The sales total in the coupon report grid is now accurately calculated by incorporating both the "Discount Tax Compensation Amount" and the "Shipping Discount Tax Compensation Amount." Previously, these amounts were missing from the calculation, leading to discrepancies between the sales total and the sales order data.

Summary: [Cloud] Cannot create order in admin on one store if only the Default Billing Address was not set up
Custom field (Release Note): Now relevant error message "A customer with the same email address already exists in an associated website." is displayed if a customer doesn't have a Default Billing Address and tries to create an order on another store.

Summary: Tier Prices return wrong value in products GraphQL (compared to Storefront)
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, product's tier prices returned for graphql requests have price per one item.

Summary: Possibility to overwrite config value even if it's locked
Custom field (Release Note): Previously to this fix, the design configuration could not be set through bin/magento config:set command and locked values could be changed by manipulation of the form displaying them. After the fix locked values set from cli with --lock-env or --lock-conf cannot be updated anymore.

Summary: An error occurs in CSM page when CMS blocks are inserted using page builder in certain order
Custom field (Release Note): Previously on some versions of PHP and OS (Linux), the rendering of blocks that referenced other cms blocks through PageBuilder would have failed with an "An unknown error occurred. Please try again.". Now the content of the cms blocks is rendered correctly inside a PageBuilder controlled content.

Summary: After logging in, the products added to the compare list as a guest user are not visible.
Custom field (Release Note):
Products that were added to product compare list before logging in as a customer now are preserved after logging in.
Previously, after logging in, the products added to the compare list as a guest user were not visible.

Summary: [CLOUD] Restricted admin users can see the return menu and buttons
Custom field (Release Note):
Restricted Admin users now don't have access to RMA related controls (menu and buttons).
Previously restricted admin users could see the return menu and buttons.

Summary: Performance issue on Cart price rule - Advance Sales Rule module
Custom field (Release Note): Added missing DB indexes for AdvancedSalesRule filters

Summary: Issue sales rules with Fixed amount discount and "Maximum Qty Discount is Applied To"
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed issue with cart rules discount, when fixed amount discount is configured to be applied for a limited qty of products is the cart. Previously, the "Maximum Qty Discount is Applied To" value was used to calculate current item's price in the cart, not only for calculation the rule's discount.

Summary: [Internal] Fixture apply failure is not shown during execution or in logs
Unable to ship the order when MSI pick up store is enabled
Custom field (Release Note): Improved inventory performance of create shipping in case of many sources with in-store pickup

Summary: [Cloud] Stock alert email translation to the wrong language
Custom field (Release Note): When sending Stock/Price Alerts for a website with multiple store views using different languages, the language for the store view where the alert was created will be used on the email.

Summary: Issues with shared "<project_id>/var/tmp"
Custom field (Release Note): Analytics DataExport temporary files will use the sys tmp directory, which is more suitable for frequent access and changes. To avoid collisions in case multiple instances are running on the same server, the tmp path was updated to use an instance's unique id

Summary: FedEx Track API not working with REST credentials
Custom field (Release Note): Previously FedEx integration didn't require additional API keys for Tracking API. Now new configuration was added to support Tracking API keys.

Summary: [CLOUD] Magento upgrade caused coupons to become case-sensitive
Custom field (Release Note): Before the fix you were required to type in the coupon code exactly as it was configured taking into consideration uppercase or lowercase. Now, the coupon will be validated in the backend regardless of uppercase or lowercase code configuration.

Summary: Critical 500 Error: Magento\Framework\Webapi\Exception Related to Accept HTTP Header
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, there is no issue with specifying the "Accept" header.

Summary: Type Error occurred when creating object: Magento\CatalogSearch\Model\Indexer\Fulltext\Interceptor Exception
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, an instance of Magento\CatalogSearch\Model\Indexer\Fulltext class can be created without specifying $data.

Summary: no graphQl available for subscribing Reward Points updates for customer
Custom field (Release Note): Previously to the fix, customer attribute reward_warning_notification could not be updated through GraphQL mutation and Rest API call. Now can be updated the same as customer attribute reward_update_notification.

Summary: Cart rules "Fixed amount discount for whole cart"  Action applies discounts incorrectly
Custom field (Release Note): Coupon codes will be validated properly regardless of upper case or lowercase, when used in order creation from the admin area. Before, the coupon code was not validated if it did not match the exact letter case of the configured cart rule code.

Summary: Disabled Categories are no longer have their names grayed out in the category tree
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, disabled categories were not grayed out in the category tree. Now, they are displayed with a gray-out effect.

Summary: [Cloud] FedEx Negotiated Rates not returned on REST
Custom field (Release Note): Previous to the fix,FedEx account specific rates where not sent on the response, even through according to FedEx documentation they should have been sent. After the fix, the account specific rates are sent on the response by changing the request from our side.

Summary: Cron reindex fails to update product availability on the frontend
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, Products remained out of stock on the frontend after updating the backorder status through the REST API. Now, after updating the backorder status via the REST API, products are shown as in stock.

Summary: Adding images to configurable not working when MSI is enabled.
Custom field (Release Note): Image upload for configurable product will now work as expected when inventory module is used. Previously the image upload didn't work

Summary: Some of the relations records are saved to DB when order record is saved
Custom field (Release Note): Before the fix unnecessary UPDATE queries were being triggered that can have an impact performance wise. After the fix, the unnecessary UPDATE queries were eliminated.

Summary: search_query table when of huge size, has large impact on load time frontend
Custom field (Release Note): Improved search listing page load time. Prior to the fix, the search listing page was being delayed because of an unoptimized query.

Summary: Magento\GraphQl\App\GraphQlCustomerMutationsTest.php Integration Test failure
Reset button doesn't work on Add/Edit admin user
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the Reset button did not function on the Add/Edit Admin User page. Now, in the Admin panel under System -> Permissions -> All Users, the Reset button will work correctly on the Add/Edit Admin User page.

Summary: Site Header | Special Characters Breaking the Customer Welcome section
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, special characters are shown correctly in the customer welcome section.

Summary: Magento admin URL routing wrong detection and CORS errors
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, if the custom admin domain is a subdomain of the main domain, the admin is accessible only from the configured subdomain.

Summary: In Backend, default store values for product attributes (instead of expected admin values)
Custom field (Release Note): Now In Backend, admin values are used instead of default store values for product attributes.

Summary: [CLOUD] In admin there are many javascript error in console
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, In admin panel there are many javascript error in console. Now, In the admin panel, there will be no JavaScript errors in the console, and all the default JavaScript functions will execute successfully without any issues.

Summary: [CLOUD] Unable to update the Base-prices using REST API (The value of 'value_id' in 'catalog_product_entity_decimal' is not incremented correctly.)
Custom field (Release Note): Previously to this fix, when rest api /rest/default/V1/products/base-prices was called, the increment id was increased wrongly leaving a gap between values. After the fix the increment id is increased as expected, incrementaly. Also the value_id field range was increased.

Summary: Cart rules "Fixed amount discount for whole cart"  action applies discounts incorrectly when adding bundle products
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed amount cart rules were not being applied properly for bundle products. Now, when calculating the total discount amount, bundle child products are taken into consideration, resulting in proper discount calculation.

Summary: [GraphQl] Wishlist items are visible via GraphQl but not visible on storefront
Custom field (Release Note): Wishlist products where not being properly listed when requested via GraphQL. Now, wishlist products are filtered based on provided store context.

Summary: Exported customer address cannot be imported
Custom field (Release Note): Customer address import will proceed as expected. Previously, a customer address import file would not pass validation if Share Customer Accounts = Global, and there are two websites where the default website has a restricted country list, and the address that is being imported is for another website where allowed countries are different

Summary: Incorrect url_rewrite entries creation with multiple stores in one store group
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, you could only generate URL rewrites on a website level when editing a product. With the fix, a new setting was introduced (Stores > Configuration > Catalog > Catalog > Search Engine Optimization, "Product URL Rewrite Scope" with options "Store view", "Website") that allows you to generate URL rewrites at the store view or website level.

Summary: [CLOUD] B2B: category issue via GraphQL
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the categories graphql query returns categories with allow permission even if the root category doesn't have allow permission.

Summary: [Cloud] Magento: queue message has been deleted
Custom field (Release Note): Queue messages are now properly being cleared out. Prior to the fix, given that SQL queue system was being used, new messages could have been deleted if the cleaning queue message was running at the same time.

Summary: [Cloud] Dynamic blocks will not function properly
Custom field (Release Note): Logged-in customer segments are now cleared after logout preventing the guest session from inheriting previously logged-in segments

Summary: [Cloud] Unable to set custom_attributes while comany creation over the graphql call
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, it's possible to set the "custom_attributes" attribute for the company admin during company creation using graphql request.

Summary: Broken validation for 'Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart'
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when we put `Maximum Qty Allowed in Shopping Cart` empty, it did not throw any exception, though an empty value is not accepted here. After this fix applies, putting an empty string will throw exceptions and will not allow saving the product.

Summary: Checkout shipping address form get update with wrong address
Custom field (Release Note): shippingAddressFromData is now saved into the local storage per website. Previously, an address from the wrong website could be auto-populated into the shipping address form during checkout if a store code was used in the URL and checkout was initiated from multiple websites during the same guest session.

Summary: Cart Price Rules Miscalculating Discount
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed amount discounts are now being properly calculated. Prior to the fix, fixed amount discounts were not totalled properly for bundle products.

Summary: [GraphQL] Reset password email inconsistency between content and subject/link
Custom field (Release Note): The issue has been resolved by simulating the correct store where the customer's account is registered when sending the password reset request, regardless of the website store.

Summary: [CLOUD] Checkout does not retain the selected billing address when Address Search is enabled
Custom field (Release Note): Checkout payment page will now retain the selected billing address when address search is enabled. Previously if "Number of Customer Addresses Limit" is configured to 1, and customer has more than one address, the selected billing address would disappear after reloading the page.

Summary: Nested categories in rule conditions not showing
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed issue when nested categories under level 3 category are not shown in marketing rules for category condition

Summary: Gift Card Product | Cart Merge is merging Gift Cards
Custom field (Release Note): Giftcard products now merged correctly in the cart

Summary: [Pagebuilder Preview UI Issue] The buttons in the Page Builder column aren't lining up correctly
Custom field (Release Note): The buttons in the Page Builder columns are now correctly aligned. Previously, they were misaligned within the Page Builder columns.

Summary: Configurable product edit form load causes timeout and memory exhaustion
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix configurable product variations were constructed based on all possible attribute option combinations. In cases where attributes had a lot of options this resulted in a lengthy and resource consuming operation. Now, configurable product variations are constructed based on existing child product attributes. This results in far less calculations - thus an improved usage of resources.

Summary: All products are indexed with [is_out_of_stock] = 1 when the SKU is not set as a searchable attribute
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the "is_out_of_stock" in catalog search index is correct, even when sku is not searchable.

Summary: Cart persistence is not being respected upon logout
Custom field (Release Note): Added missing functionality Remember Me from customer login to authentication popup and checkout sign ins.

Summary: Admin duplicated place order requests sent
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the "Submit Order" button in the admin panel could be clicked multiple times or activated by repeatedly pressing the "Enter" key, causing duplicate or order submissions with error. Now, preventing additional actions until the order is fully processed, ensuring that only one order is submitted.

Summary: [Cloud] products GraphQL query returns related products not assigned to current website
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, for graphQL query, multi-store related products do not show properly for product query. After this fix is applied, for products, graphQL query multi-store related products showing accordingly.

Summary: [Cloud] Removing template with missing images causes pub/media to be deleted
Custom field (Release Note): Previously to this fix, if the preview image name was missing for a pagebuilder template, the pub/media folder was deleted. After the fix, only the template will be deleted and the preview image if found.

Summary: Admin can still place order even without payment method
Custom field (Release Note): Previously selected payment method is now retained when the payment method reappears in the list of available payments.

Summary: Pagebuilder's template preview failure for large content
Custom field (Release Note): Large content was leading to canvas element overflowing the browser's limits, and returning incorrect value, which broke backend code (cannot properly decode the image). Fixed with limiting canvas size to the universal browser's limit.

Summary: Latest security updates with TinyMCE 7 missing font size
Custom field (Release Note): Font size and font family selectors are now available in WYSIWYG editor. Prior to this fix, with TinyMCE 7 these were not available in the editor interface.

Summary: Products Ordered report is not exporting. 404 error instead.
Custom field (Release Note): Products Ordered report excport to CSV and XML now works as expected

Summary: usage_limit and uses_per_customer not updating in salesrule_coupon Table
Custom field (Release Note): Updating Uses per Coupon and Uses per Customer in cart price rule will now affect existing autogenerated coupons. Previously the new values affected only new coupons

Summary: Allow Countries configuration causes issues in customer address configurations
Custom field (Release Note): Now selecting Allow Countries configuration doesn't influence countries shown for outside the given scope. Previously Allow Countries configuration influenced customer address attribute outside given scope

Summary: Unable to download files from Data Collector
Custom field (Release Note): Downloading backup no longer shows blank page instead of downloading the file.

Summary: Return Screen is messed up when refresh the screen
Custom field (Release Note): The user can refresh the page without experiencing screen distortion.

Summary: Shared Gift Registry shows the event date as 1 day earlier
Custom field (Release Note): Gift Registry date is shown correctly now on Storefront

Summary: Using the wrong Store ID in GraphQL header causes fatal memory error
Custom field (Release Note): Sending wrong store code in GraphQL request no longer results in excessive memory consumption.

Summary: [Cloud] Wrong quantity in CSV file did not give error
Custom field (Release Note): Now stock sources import will throw validation error for non numeric values in the quantity column. Previously, importing stock sources with non numeric value in the quantity column resulted in the quantity being set to 0.

Summary: Unable to Update Scheduled Update When Using Unique Custom Category Attribute
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where updating a scheduled update for a category was not possible if the category had a unique attribute

Summary: Fotorama doesn't load video correctly when using Swatches and option is pre-selected via URL
Custom field (Release Note): Product videos will now render properly on configurable product details page, if the URL contains selected options.

Summary: Duplicated URL key error message generated when importing a product is not correct when the URL Key already belongs to a category
Custom field (Release Note): Displaying the correct error message during product import check, when customer tried to import product when product's url key already belongs to a category.

Summary: Cart price rule doesn't consider parent category when it is using "equals or greater than" condition.
Custom field (Release Note): Cart Price Rules now consider parent category correctly when it is used in advanced conditions

Summary: TinyMCE JS Error in console after Js minification enable with production mode
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, enabling JavaScript minification in production mode within the admin panel caused JavaScript errors related to TinyMCE 6 to appear in the browser console, affecting the functionality and user experience. Now, This issue has been resolved, ensuring that TinyMCE 6 operates smoothly without generating any errors, even when JS minification is enabled.

Summary: [MFTF] StorefrontCheckoutProcessForQuoteWithoutNegotiatedPricesTest
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed mftfs

Summary: Request for additional changes to fully complete the ACP2E-3375 fix
Order items are not visible in credit memo emails for the API POST V1/order/:orderId/refund
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, before this fix, when a customer creates a credit memo from an API request notifying send_email, it does not contain the product details grid. After this fix apply the customer sends a credit memo API request, and will find the product item details appearing in the email.

Summary: PageBuilder Carousel Widget shows products that doesn't match conditions
Custom field (Release Note): Product list used in widgets now respects category condition

Summary: Invalid discount calculation with priority
Custom field (Release Note): In the case of fixed amount appllied for the whole cart discount type, the amount was not being calculated properly for cart items that were already discounted by a previous promotion. Now, discounts are properly summed up.

Summary: Place order button disappears in Purchase Order details
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where Place order button was hidden for approved purchase orders when a product variation had minimum number in card specified

Summary: [Cloud] 500 response to empty Graphql response on 2.4.7
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, invalid graphql requests will not be logged into the exception.log file.

Summary: Validation Error Triggered for All Products in Group When One Has Invalid Quantity
Custom field (Release Note): Now, the validation error is correctly triggered for all products in the group when one product has an invalid quantity, which was not happening previously.

Summary: Issue with Bundle Product + MSI in Clean M2.4.7-p3
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, for inventory bundle products after duplication with the same simple product, the simple product can not be saved. After this fix is applied, the simple product can be saved successfully without any exceptions.

Summary: [Cloud] Products in Category - Add Products - Assign - Select All
Custom field (Release Note): Users can now select or deselect products using the toggle.

Summary: [CLOUD] Shipping calculation is not considering the shopping cart rule
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, a cart rule with region condition was not being applied consistently. After the fix, cart rules with region conditions are being applied properly.

Summary: [CLOUD] No such entity with id = 0 with b2b module
Custom field (Release Note):
Logged in user is able to add product to cart when Shared Catalog features are enabled.
Previously adding product to cart resulted in Error 'no such entity with id = 0'

Summary: Product export causes OOM even with 4G memory limit
Custom field (Release Note): Previous to this fix, the product export failed if product attributes had thousands of option values even with 4G available memory. After this fix, the product export should finish exporting the csv file.

Summary: [Cloud] Product import time has significantly increased
Custom field (Release Note): Previous to the fix, catalog product import with over 10K entries had a significant time degradation. After the fix, the import of catalog product executes in a timely manner.

Summary: TinyMCE 7 editor font size in the admin in PT and not PX please clarify
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix you could not specify font size in px in WYSIWYG areas. Now you can set the font size in px instead of pt.

Summary: Default values are not set for date and time attributes with products RestAPI
Custom field (Release Note): Default values now sets properly for date and date and time attributes via RestAPI

Summary: Existing quote data is not update / not visible, instead create a new quote record when trigger_recollect = 1
Custom field (Release Note): Customer's shopping cart items no longer disappear as result of a product being deleted after it was added to the shopping cart.

Summary: Product Content Type in Page Builder Gets Collapsed Without Correct Messages
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix the preview html was not being generated properly when there were no products in the widget. Now, the empty response is properly generated and products widget is being displayed fine in preview.

Summary: Cart rule sku condition is failing for invoice.
Custom field (Release Note): Discount on Bundle product with dynamic price is now correctly reflected in the invoice. Previously, the discount was not reflected on the invoice.

Summary: [Cloud] Problems with Graphql API
Custom field (Release Note): Before the fix by using Graphql application server, customer address request did not return the most recent data.

Summary: When a gift registry item is purchased, the customer sees items not on their registry
Custom field (Release Note): Gift registry update no longer includes items that do not belong to the gift registry.

Summary: Incorrect discount value when multiple cart price rules are applied simultaneously with discounted/special priced products
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, fixed amount for whole cart rules were not being applied properly if more than one was being applied. Now, fixed amount discount cart rules are being applied properly.

Summary: VAPT: Business Logic Error - future date as customer date of birth
Custom field (Release Note): Customer's date of birth can not be set later than today

Summary: Automatic enabling of new ACL permissions
Custom field (Release Note): New permissions added to custom modules will no longer automatically grant access to all existing user roles unless explicitly configured.

Summary: Disabled product still appears in related, upsell, crosssell items in grpahQL query
Custom field (Release Note): Graphql now provide correct response for disabled relared, upsell and cross-sell products

Summary: Admin Actions Log User Report doesnt show details for adminhtml_user_delete
Custom field (Release Note): The adminhtml_user_delete now correctly logs important details. Previously, logs were not generated for user deletions.

Summary: [Cloud] Issue with "Remove All" Confirmation Popup Removing Cart Items Without Confirmation
Custom field (Release Note): Now, clicking the "Remove All" button for attention-required products prompts a confirmation popup to ensure items are only removed with your confirmation. Previously, items were removed immediately without any confirmation

Summary: [CLOUD] Special price not showing in Configurable product
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, changing the "Used in Product Listing" value for the special price attribute will not affect showing the special price for configurable products.

Summary: Indexers Temporary tables are not cleaned up if the process is terminated
Custom field (Release Note): CatalogRule indexer temporary tables are now cleaned up if the indexer process is terminated

Summary: Items are duplicated after we create an order from Admin on - Mozilla Firefox browser
Custom field (Release Note): Products added using "Add Products by SKU" are no longer duplicated in Firefox when creating an order in admin.

Summary: [QUANS] Core unit test failures in 2.4.7-p3
Custom field (Release Note): Release notes for this test is not needed since it is a Unit-test improvement.

Summary: [CLOUD] Issue with Products are Not Visible in Frontend After Saving in Magento Admin
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix configurable products that have child products with long names will not be missed in the storefront.

Summary: [Cloud] Import Processes Interfering with Each Other
Custom field (Release Note): Correct messages are shown if the same admin user performs two or more import operations using the same user session.

Summary: Sitemap Generation Warnings
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the sitemap is generated in the system tmp directory and copied to the final destination.

Summary: Performance Issue in Stock Quantity Retrieval for Grouped Products with Multiple Sources
Custom field (Release Note): Grouped product and bundle product edit page is now optimized when assigned products have large number of inventory sources.

Summary: [page builder]Adding Product Listing to block results in errors
Custom field (Release Note): Now adding Bundle Product Listing to block via page builder doesn't results in errors

Summary: Cart Rule with shipping condition not applying when placing order from admin
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, if the cart price rule has a shipping method discount with the coupon, it can not be applied through Admin UI. After this fix is applied, the cart price rule discount with a coupon for a specific shipping method will be applied from Admin UI successfully.

Summary: Corresponding cache key entries are not available in cache tags, hence cache cleaning does not work correctly
Custom field (Release Note): LUA mode is now enabled by default for Redis cache garbage collector to prevent race conditions

Summary: [FRESH] HEX code is not updating correctly in SWATCH
Custom field (Release Note): HEX code that is manually entered by user in the Visual Swatch color picker is no longer altered by the system. Previously, certain HEX codes experienced slight adjustments due to conversion errors between color models.

Summary: Customer Segment edition fails with daterange
Custom field (Release Note): It is possible to save customer segment with date range condition, when only one of dates was edited.

Summary: No error message displayed for our of stock products when bulk adding from requisition list
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix a success message was being displayed regardless of the number of products that failed to be added to the cart. Now, separate messages are being displayed for products there were successfully added to the cart and for products that failed.

Summary: [CLOUD] Re-order button functionality
Custom field (Release Note): Re-orderind an order from the administrator area will now add products with stock to the quote even though there are some products in the original order that do not have stock anymore. Prior to the fix no products were being added to the new quote if product with no stock were in the original order.

Summary: Search stores are not working by zip code
Custom field (Release Note): Searching pickup locations by zip code was not working properly for Dutch localisations. After the fix, the pickup location search will provide results based on zip code.

Summary: Issue with SKU Updates after Scheduled Updates Causing Incorrect Product Permissions (-2 Deny)
Custom field (Release Note): Modifying a product's SKU with past scheduled updates no longer causes the product to be inaccessible to the shared catalog customers entitled to see the product.

Summary: Adobe Commerce 2.4.7-p3 unit tests are failing
Custom field (Release Note): No release notes are required.

Summary: Refix https://jira.corp.adobe.com/browse/ACP2E-3389
Custom field (Release Note): Improved performance of admin category page in case of large number of anchor categories

Summary: [CLOUD]: GraphQl error Internal server error placeOrder mutation
Custom field (Release Note): The "placeOrder" mutation with coupon code information in the request is no longer throwing an internal error exception, the order was placed successfully. Previously, it failed with "Internal server error".

Summary: Incorrect canonical URL for category when page > 1
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the canonical URL for multi-page content did not function correctly, consistently displaying the base URL. However, after the fix was implemented, the canonical URL for multi-page content now correctly displays the URL with the page ID.

Summary: MAGENTO_DC_INDEXER__USE_APPLICATION_LOCK value is ignored
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, an ENV variable set to "false" will be treated as bool false, not as string 'false'.

Summary: Product listing GraphQL query limited to total_count 10,000 products only
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the search result is not limited to 10000 products, it becomes possible to get all products matching the search criteria even if the count is more than 10000.

Summary: Pay via LPM
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly renders Local Payment Methods (LPM) on initial load, even when a logged-in customer's shipping and billing addresses do not match, ensuring a smooth checkout process. Previously, a mismatch between a customer's shipping and billing addresses would prevent LPM from rendering, causing potential disruptions during checkout.

Summary: Configurable with Virtual as Child Product
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows express payment methods for configurable products that have a virtual  child product, ensuring a smooth checkout process. Previously, express payment methods were not available when a configurable product with a virtual  child product was added to the cart.

Summary: CVV Verification failed error
Vaulting Via the account Area Issues 247
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows customers to save new card or PayPal account information across multiple websites without encountering authorization errors. Previously, customers were unable to save new payment methods across different websites and were presented with an authorization error message.

Summary: Ship to an address from a different country
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows transactions to be processed without errors when shipping to an address from a different country, ensuring a smooth checkout process. Previously, attempting to ship to an address from a different country would result in console errors, despite no visible errors on the frontend.

Summary: Credit Card - Teardown function
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly handles the teardown of Braintree PayPal components when a customer navigates back from the payment page to the shipping page, preventing any errors and ensuring that PayPal Express buttons render correctly. Previously, navigating back to the shipping page from the payment page sometimes resulted in an error when trying to teardown the Braintree PayPal components.

Summary: Shipping Callback for PayPal Express
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly displays available shipping methods in the PayPal Express modal, allowing customers to select their preferred shipping method before proceeding to the review page or completing their transaction. Previously, no shipping methods were available to select from in the PayPal Express modal, requiring customers to select a shipping method on a separate review page before they could complete their transaction.

Summary: [Braintree] Refund online storing transaction as transactionid-refund
[Braintree] + [CLOUD] Braintree (credit card) orders unable to split the charges
[Braintree] [Cloud]Braintree SSL Certificate expire by June 30
private_content_version cookie returned in GQL queries
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue where the private_content_version cookie was returned in GraphQL queries, even when the session cookie was disabled. The cookie is no longer included in GraphQL responses when the session is disabled, as expected.

Summary: Server error on email props in physical gift card queries
